name: Duel Revolution (itch)
description:
Welcome to Duel Revolution, the ultimate monster taming MMORPG!

As a duelist, you'll collect and train powerful Evo creatures to battle against other players in dynamic matches. With a unique skill tree based leveling system, you can customize your Evo to become the ultimate fighting machine.

Play with friends and show off your team's strength in multiplayer battles. Duel Revolution is available for Windows, Mac, Android, and iOS devices. Join the revolution and become the ultimate duelist today!

Join our active community on Discord for support, updates, and to connect with other players. Click the link to join: https://discord.gg/5G8dKwaAxu
